data.prayer: Father, let those from the 3,546 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Aveyron, Occitanie, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 3,546 believers in the county of Aveyron to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Aveyron, Occitanie, France to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Aveyron that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Iu Mien people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Aveyron who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Aveyron, Occitanie, France that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,546 believers in Aveyron to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 285,054 lost friends and neighbors.
